sentences.en: A much bigger battle is ahead for the president.
sentences.cn: 一场更为艰巨的战斗正等待着总统。

sentences.en: Do book ahead as the restaurant is very popular.
sentences.cn: 该饭店非常受欢迎，请务必提前预订。

sentences.en: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
sentences.cn: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.en: He looked straight ahead and overtook a lumbering lorry.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛直视前方，加速超过了前面一辆慢吞吞行进的大卡车。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: He raced ahead up into the bush, barking and snarling.
sentences.cn: 它嗥叫着冲向前，一头钻进了灌木丛。

sentences.en: He stared straight ahead .
sentences.cn: 他直视前方。

sentences.en: Henry hurried on ahead (=  went in front of the others  ) .
sentences.cn: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

sentences.en: Henry hurried on ahead.
sentences.cn: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

sentences.en: I cook rice two or three hours ahead.
sentences.cn: 我提前两三个小时煮好米饭。

sentences.en: I'd have to send Tina on ahead with Rachael.
sentences.cn: 我只有让蒂娜和雷切尔一起先行一步。

sentences.en: If prepared many hours ahead, the mixture may separate out.
sentences.cn: 如果提前几个小时就准备好了，混合物可能会分离开。

sentences.en: It all leaves the way clear for Tesco to power ahead.
sentences.cn: 这一切为乐购的进一步发展扫清了障碍。

sentences.en: Mark was out of earshot, walking ahead of them.
sentences.cn: 马克走在前面，听不见他们的声音。

sentences.en: Plans are rolling full steam ahead for the Jamaica Festival.
sentences.cn: 庆祝牙买加节的准备工作正开展得如火如荼。

sentences.en: she walked ahead of him along the corridor.
sentences.cn: 她沿着走廊在他前面走。

sentences.en: The election was held six months ahead of schedule.
sentences.cn: 选举提前了6个月举行。

sentences.en: The home team was ahead in the second period. Your company is ahead in developing the new technology.
sentences.cn: 主队在第二阶段的比赛中处于领先。你们的公司在发展新科技方面处于领先地位

sentences.en: The party was planned weeks ahead.
sentences.cn: 聚会提前几个星期就已筹划好了。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister was speaking ahead of today's meeting.
sentences.cn: 首相在今天的会议开始之前作了发言。

sentences.en: The shares bounded ahead a further 11p to 311p.
sentences.cn: 股票价格又急涨了11便士，攀至311便士。

sentences.en: They went ahead without waiting for a reply from the Germans.
sentences.cn: 他们没等德国人答复就接着往下推进。

sentences.en: We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead .
sentences.cn: 我们能看到前方拉斯维加斯的灯光。

sentences.en: We have a very busy day ahead of us today.
sentences.cn: 今天迎接我们的将是非常忙碌的一天。

phrases.tran_cn: 超前的，比所处时代激进的；更具未来时代特征的
获得成功；取得进步；走在前面

trans.tran_cn: 在前面，向前，将来，事前，提前，占优势，领先
trans.tran_en: a short distance in front of someone or something
